about_the_game:
The Crusader Kings II: The Reaper's Due Content Pack contains a Portrait Pack detailing the east African provinces and a Clothing Pack focusing on the late
Byzantine Empire. In addition to these, there are fifteen new models for both Eastern and African councilors.

The Content Pack features:
  • • East African Portrait Pack
  • • Late Byzantine Clothing Pack
  • • Eastern Female Model Pack
  • • African Female and Male Model Packs
detailed_description:
Special Offer

Want everything that The Reaper's Due have to offer? This collection includes both Crusader Kings II: The Reaper’s Due and Crusader Kings II: The Reaper’s Due Content pack.


About the Game

The Crusader Kings II: The Reaper's Due Content Pack contains a Portrait Pack detailing the east African provinces and a Clothing Pack focusing on the late
Byzantine Empire. In addition to these, there are fifteen new models for both Eastern and African councilors.

The Content Pack features:
  • • East African Portrait Pack
  • • Late Byzantine Clothing Pack
  • • Eastern Female Model Pack
  • • African Female and Male Model Packs

linux_requirements.minimum:
• OS: Ubuntu 12.04 LTS
  • Processor: IntelR PentiumR IV 2.4 GHz or AMD 3500+
  • Memory: 2 GB
  • Hard disk space: 2 Gb
  • Video Card: ATI Radeon HD 6750 / NVIDIA GeForce 320 / NVIDIA GeForce
    > 9600 or higher, 1024MB graphics memory required.

mac_requirements.minimum:
• OS: Mac OS X 10.6.8 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core Duo Processor (2GHz or better)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Hard Disk Space: 2 GB
  • Video Card: ATI Radeon HD 6750 / NVIDIA GeForce 320 / NVIDIA GeForce
    9600 or higher, 1024MB graphics memory required
